mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.description, c.remark FROM d_calendar c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.id = #{id} AND c.flag = TRUE
SELECT c.id, c.title, c.description, c.remark FROM d_calendar c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.flag = TRUE ORDER BY c.id DESC
SELECT COUNT( c.id ) FROM d_calendar c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.flag = TRUE
SELECT c.id, c.title, c.description, c.remark FROM d_calendar c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.flag = TRUE ORDER BY c.id DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{size}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.description, c.remark FROM d_calendar c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.flag = TRUE AND c.id >= ( #{weeksBegin} - 1 ) * 7 AND c.id <= ( #{weeksBegin} + #{weeksSize} - 1 ) * 7 ORDER BY c.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO d_calendar ( title, description, remark, flag, create_user_id, create_time, modify_user_id, modify_time ) VALUES ( #{item.title}, #{item.description}, #{item.remark}, TRUE, #{item.userId}, now(), #{item.userId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE d_calendar c SET c.title = #{item.title}, c.description = #{item.description}, c.remark = #{item.remark}, c.modify_user_id = #{item.userId}, c.modify_time = now() WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.id = #{item.id}
UPDATE d_calendar c SET c.flag = FALSE, c.modify_user_id = #{item.userId}, c.modify_time = now() WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.id = #{item.id}
